data.title: Livingston Butler Volland Funeral Home
data.meta_description: Juniata resident Tom Frerichs, 72, passed away Saturday, May 15, 2021, at his home in Juniata, NE.      Services will be 3 p.m. Wednesday, May 19, at Butler Volland Chapel in Ha...
data.text:
Juniata resident Tom Frerichs, 72, passed away Saturday, May 15, 2021, at his home in Juniata, NE.

Services will be 3 p.m. Wednesday, May 19, at Butler Volland Chapel in Hastings with Pastor Kathy Uldrich officiating. Burial will be held at a later date at the Juniata Cemetery. Visitation will be 3-7 p.m. Tuesday with family present 5-7 p.m. at the funeral home, and one hour prior to the service. Memorials may be given to the Juniata Cemetery Association. The service will be live-streamed on Livingston Butler Volland Funeral Home’s Facebook page. The direct link for that page is www.facebook.com/lbvfh , the link will not be live until five minutes before service time. For the health and safety of others face masks are recommended for those attending the funeral, your cooperation is appreciated.

Tom was born August 12, 1948, in Hastings, NE to Walter & Rae Celia (Overfield) Frerichs. He graduated from Juniata High School in 1971 and received his business degree from Kearney State College in Kearney, NE. Tom married Joann Buell on March 24, 1973, at Juniata United Methodist Church in Juniata, NE. He served in the Nebraska National Guard from 1971 to 1977.

Tom farmed in the area for many years. He was a member of Juniata United Methodist Church, Juniata Cemetery Board, American Legion in Juniata, and Southern Hills Golf Course.

Tom was preceded in death by his parents and son, Shaun Frerichs.

SURVIVORS:

Wife:

Joann Frerichs – Juniata, NE

Son & Spouse:

Dr. Shane & Amber Frerichs – Colorado Springs, CO

Grandchildren:

Zane Frerichs – Lincoln, NE

Coralynn Frerichs – Colorado Springs, CO

Brother & Spouse:

Daniel & Liz Frerichs – Gothenburg, NE

Sister:

Lynn Wiseman – Juniata, NE

Numerous Nieces, Nephews, Cousins, Great-Nieces, and Great-Nephews
